cn.domob.android.ads

类 SplashAd

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.domob.android.ads.SplashAd

  • public class SplashAd
extends java.lang.Object

    A class for invoking Domob splash ads.

    Calls and displays splash ads through invoking this class.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  SplashAd.SplashMode
      Domob Splash Mode

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明

      Constructor for splash ad

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void closeSplash()
      Remove splash view from window if your splash screen is not a SINGLE Activity.
      boolean isSplashAdReady()
      Checks whether splash ad is ready or not.

      Sets keywords available for splash ads
      void setSplashAdListener(SplashAdListener listener)
      Sets listener for splash ad
      void setSplashTopMargin(int topMargin)
      Set top margin of the splash view if splash mode is NOT full screen.

      Sets user's gender information.

      Sets user's postal code information

      Displays splash ad.
